faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Text-to-speech technology converts written text into spoken voice audio. Our solution uses advanced AI models from OpenAI to create natural-sounding speech that closely resembles human voices.
faq.q2: How many languages do you support?
faq.a2: We currently support over 40 languages including English, Chinese, Spanish, French, and many more. We're constantly adding new languages and improving existing ones.
faq.q3: Can I use the generated audio commercially?
faq.a3: Yes, all audio files generated on our platform can be used for commercial purposes under our paid plans. The Basic plan has some limitations for commercial use.
faq.q4: How do I download my audio files?
faq.a4: After generating your audio, simply click the download button to save the file in MP3 format. You can then use it in your projects, presentations, or content.
faq.a5: Our AI-powered voices are highly realistic with natural intonation, rhythm, and emphasis. Many users report that listeners cannot distinguish our AI voices from human recordings.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.p1: VoiceGenius ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our text-to-speech service.
introduction.p2: By accessing or using our service, you consent to the collection, use, disclosure, and storage of your information as described in this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with our policies and practices, please do not use our services.

infoCollected.title: Information We Collect

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.p1: We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you:

usageData.title: Usage Data
usageData.p1: We automatically collect certain information about how you interact with our service, including your IP address, browser type, operating system, referring URLs, access times, and pages viewed. Additionally, we collect information related to the text content you submit for conversion to speech and usage patterns of our text-to-speech features.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.p1: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures designed to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction.
dataSecurity.p2: However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

thirdParty.p2: We may use third-party service providers to help us operate our business or administer activities on our behalf, such as sending communications or analyzing usage data. We may share your information with these third parties, but only to the extent necessary to perform these services on our behalf and under obligations similar to those in this Privacy Policy.

By using our service, you consent to the transfer of your information to the United States and understand that your information may be subject to U.S. laws, which may differ from those of your country of residence.
